{{year-header}}

==March==
* '''25''' - ''[[Tales of the Shire: A "The Lord of the Rings" Game]]'' is released.

==May==
* '''[[31 May|31]]''' - After 12 years in the role, [[Shaun Gunner]] steps down as Chair of [[The Tolkien Society]] to become its first Chief Executive Officer. He is succeeded as Acting Chair by Daniel Helen.<ref name="CEO">{{webcite|author=Daniel Helen|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/2025/06/tolkien-society-appoints-new-chief-executive/|articlename=Tolkien Society appoints new Chief Executive|date=2 June 2025|website=TS|accessed=2 June 2025}}</ref>

==June==
* '''[[1 June|1]]''' - [[Shaun Gunner]] is appointed Chief Executive Officer of [[The Tolkien Society]], having previously served over 12 years as Chair.<ref name="CEO">{{webcite|author=Daniel Helen|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/2025/06/tolkien-society-appoints-new-chief-executive/|articlename=Tolkien Society appoints new Chief Executive|date=2 June 2025|website=TS|accessed=2 June 2025}}</ref>

==August==
*'''[[12 August|12]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2026]]'' is published.

==September==
*'''[[12 September|12]]''' - Actor [[Sean Astin]] elected President of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SAG-AFTRA Screen Actors Guildâ€“American Federation of Television and Radio Artists] (SAG-AFTRA)
*'''[[16 September|16]]''' - Release of the revised and expanded edition of ''[[The Hobbit (comic book)|The Hobbit: A Graphic Novel]]''

==October==
*'''[[9 October|9]] - Release of ''[[The Bovadium Fragments: together with The Origin of Bovadium]]''.'''
*'''[[23 October|23]]''' - Release of ''[[Doomed to Die: An A-Z of Death in Tolkien]]''.

==November==
*'''[[11 November|11]]''' - Release of ''[[Doomed to Die: An A-Z of Death in Tolkien]]'' in the U.S.
*'''[[18 November|18]]''' - Release of ''[[The Bovadium Fragments: together with The Origin of Bovadium]]'' in the U.S.
